description: This file defines the ClusterCommandEvent class, which models an event related to cluster commands received in a Zigbee environment. It includes properties like EUI64 address, profile ID, cluster ID, command ID, signal quality metrics, and methods to retrieve and encode its payload.

classes.name: ClusterCommandEvent
classes.description: Represents a Zigbee cluster command event with properties like EUI64, profile, cluster ID, command ID, and signal quality metrics.

methods.name: getEui64
methods.description: Returns the EUI64 identifier of the device that sent the event.

methods.name: getProfileId
methods.description: Returns the profile ID associated with the event.

methods.name: getSourceEndpoint
methods.description: Returns the source endpoint ID of the event.

methods.name: getClusterId
methods.description: Returns the cluster ID associated with the event.

methods.name: getDirection
methods.description: Returns the direction of the event as 1 if from server, 0 otherwise.

methods.name: getMfgSpecific
methods.description: Indicates whether the command is manufacturer-specific.

methods.name: getMfgCode
methods.description: Returns the manufacturer code if the command is manufacturer-specific.

methods.name: getCommandId
methods.description: Returns the command ID that was received.

methods.name: getRssi
methods.description: Returns the Received Signal Strength Indicator.

methods.name: getSeqNum
methods.description: Returns the sequence number of this event.

methods.name: getEncodedBuf
methods.description: Returns the Base64-encoded payload of the command.

methods.name: getCommandPayload
methods.description: Returns the byte array payload for the command, meant to be overridden by subclasses.
